item.title: Restaurant uchun vebsayt
item.description: Resraurant uchun vebsayt Bu saytda restarant haqida ma’lumot olish mumkin. Buyurtma berish, menyuni ko’rish va boshqa imkoniyatlari bor. Saytning admin paneli filamentphpda qilingan. Bu laravel uchun eng yaxshi bepul admin panel hisoblanadi. Buyurtmalar foydalanuvchi tomonidan yoki admin tomonidan saqlanishi mumkin.

item.title: Sayohat agentligi uchun vebsayt
item.description: Sayohat agentligi uchun qulay dizaynga ega veb sahifa Kontentni uzluksiz boshqarish va ma’muriy vazifalarni bajarish uchun mustahkam boshqaruv paneli bilan jihozlangan sayyohlik agentligi uchun imkoniyatlarga boy va vizual jihatdan jozibali veb-sayt ishlab chiqilgan va ishlab chiqilgan. Ushbu loyiha sayohatchilar uchun foydalanuvchilarga qulay front-end va ma’murlar uchun turlar, bandlovlar va kontent yangilanishlarini boshqarish uchun keng qamrovli tizimni yaratishni o’z ichiga oldi. Veb sahifa 3 ta tilda qilingan.

About me About Me Hello, I’m Azizbek Tursunov, a 21-year-old backend developer with a passion for crafting efficient and robust web applications. I specialize in PHP and Laravel, two technologies that have become the cornerstone of my career. My Journey My journey into the world of web development began at a young age at school when I discovered my fascination with making web sites using HTML. Over the years, I’ve honed my skills and developed a deep understanding of backend development, with a particular focus on PHP and Laravel.
